Preventing Burns
■Wear special gloves, an apron,
and a face shield when handling
the hot oil.
■Do not put your hands in the
oil or drop objects forcefully.

Preventing Fires
■Be sure that there is oil in
the vat before turning on the
frier.
■Calibrate the frier and check
the high limit switch.

Preventing Fires
■Make sure the exhaust fan is
on before operating frier.
■Clean the grease pan of the
frier duct regularly.
